name: 2024 The 13th International Conference on Economics and Finance Research
content: Publicationï¼š All papers submitted to the ICEFR 2024, will be published in one of those two journals below: Option A: International Journal of Trade, Economics and Finance (IJTEF) ISSN: 2010-023X (Print) DOI: 10.18178/IJTEF Indexing: ProQuest, Crossref, Electronic Journals Library , EBSCO, and Ulrich's Periodicals Directory Paper Template: http://www.icefr.org/IJTEF\_template.doc Option B: International Journal of Economics, Business and Management. (JOEBM) ISSN: 2301-3567 (Print), 2972-3981 (Online) DOI: 10.18178/JOEBM Indexing: CNKI, Electronic Journals Library, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, MESLibrary, Google Scholar, and Crossref. Paper Template: http://www.icefr.org/JOEBM\_template.doc
organizers: Ajman University, Ajman, United Arab Emirates
